Rowdy Wolf:





Rowdy Wolf stayed where he was, watching coldly as Striker left the cave. He 
shouted after him, "Tell them nothing of me! I wish to be safe here! I do 
not wish to be a fool in your war! I am here as a last resort! Away!"
